USE nyc_taxi_discovery
GO

WITH v_payment_type AS
(
        SELECT 
            CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc, '$.payment_type') AS BIGINT) payment_type,
            CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc, '$.payment_type_desc') AS VARCHAR(15)) payment_type_desc
        FROM 
        OPENROWSET (
        BULK 'payment_type.json',
        DATA_SOURCE ='calendar_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b'
        )
        WITH(
        jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
        ) AS payment_type
),

v_taxi_zone AS 
(
        SELECT
            *
        FROM
            OPENROWSET(
                BULK 'https://synapsecoursedlhp.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
                FORMAT = 'CSV',
                PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
                HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
                FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
                ROWTERMINATOR ='\n'
            )
        WITH
        (
            LocationID INT,
            Borough VARCHAR(15),
            Zone VARCHAR(50),
            service_zone VARCHAR(15)
        )
        AS [result]
),

v_trip_data AS 
(
        SELECT
            *
        FROM
        OPENROWSET(
            BULK 'trip_data_green_csv/year=2020/month=01/green_tripdata_2020-01.csv',
            DATA_SOURCE = 'calendar_data_raw',
            FORMAT = 'CSV',
            PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
            HEADER_ROW = TRUE
        ) AS [result]
)

SELECT 
    v_taxi_zone.Borough,
    COUNT(1) as total_trips,
    SUM(CASE WHEN v_payment_type.payment_type_desc='Cash' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as cash_trips,
    SUM(CASE WHEN v_payment_type.payment_type_desc='Credit card' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as card_trips,
    CAST((SUM(CASE WHEN v_payment_type.payment_type_desc='Cash' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)/CAST(COUNT(1) as DECIMAL(5, 2))) * 100 AS DECIMAL(5, 2))  as cash_trips_percentage

FROM v_trip_data 
LEFT JOIN v_taxi_zone ON v_trip_data.PULocationID=v_taxi_zone.locationID
LEFT JOIN v_payment_type ON v_taxi_data.payment_type = v_payment_type.payment_type
GROUP BY v_trip_data.PULocationID
